gamerule.dimensionalboom:isekaiAllMobs.d: If true all mobs will get isekai'd by the sonic boom.
gamerule.dimensionalboom:dealSonicBoomDa: Should the sonic boom deal damage (Dimensional Boom)
If true the sonic boom will deal damage upon isekai.
gamerule.dimensionalboom:showIsekaiMessa: Should all mobs send an isekai message (Dimensional Boom)
If true all mobs will send a message in chat alerting it was isekai'd.
